Amendment of Schedule 5 to Principal Regulations

title: 46, 47, 49, 50 and 63 of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of 2024),
heading: 4. Schedule 5 (as amended by Regulation 5 of the Employment Permits
text_raw:
4. Schedule 5 (as amended by Regulation 5 of the Employment Permits 
(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2025 (S.I. No. 64 of 2025)) to the Principal 
Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

in the entry for “Car mechanic, Motor mechanic, Auto electrician, 
Motor vehicle technician”— 

(i) 

in Column 2, by substituting “251” for “200”, and 

(ii) 

in Column 3, by substituting “7th April 2025” for “30 
October 2024”, 

(b) 

in the entry for “HGV/Bus mechanic”— 

(i) 

in Column 2, by substituting “97” for “200”, and 

(ii) 

in Column 3, by substituting “7th April 2025” for “2nd 
September 2024”, and 

(c) 

in the entry for “Vehicle body builder and repairer / Body Shop 
Panel Beater”— 

(i) 

in Column 2, by substituting “50” for “17”, and 

(ii) 

in Column 3, by substituting “7th April 2025” for “2nd 
September 2024”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [119] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 April, 2025. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [119]

title: 46, 47, 49, 50 and 63 of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of 2024),
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations are made under the Employment Permits Act 2024. They 
amend the Employment Permits Regulations 2024 by— 

- 
increasing the quota of General Employment Permits for employment as 
a car mechanic, motor mechanic, auto electrician or motor vehicle technician by 
200 permits, 

increasing the quota of General Employment Permits for employment as 

- 
a HGV/bus mechanic by 200 permits, and 

increasing the quota of General Employment Permits for employment as 

- 
a vehicle body builder and repairer or body shop panel beater by 50 permits. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits (Amendment) (No. 
3) Regulations 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [119] 5
